title: Smile Precure! Movie: Ehon no Naka wa Minna Chiguhagu!
original_name: 映画 スマイルプリキュア! 絵本の中はみんなチグハグ!
opening_song: "Let's go! Smile Precure! (Let`s go!スマイルプリキュア!)" by Aya Ikeda
ending_song: "Mankai*Smile! (満開＊スマイル Mankai*Sumairu)" by Hitomi Yoshida
sinopse: The movie transports the Precure into a world inside a picture book, where they are guided by Nico, a mysterious inhabitant of the picture book world.
